title: No Loot from Hextech Chest
body:
I just crafted a key and opened a Hextech Chest and got nothing from it. 

Once I clicked open on the box, the box just stayed there, frozen. I clicked on the Home page then back to the loot and there was no new loot added.
My Hextech chest and key had both disappeared too.

Can someone please help me?

replies.body: As far as I know there is an issue atm where receiving an icon + essence from a chest will not display the notification properly. Try checking your purchase history (it shows what you get from chests) to see if there is anything there.

Ahhh,

Yep, its in there. I didn't notice that i had received some orange essence.

Got the heart seeker icon...

Thanks

:) Good to know it's sorted. They're working on a fix for that atm but it's only when you get an icon + essence that the notification isn't playing properly so it's not something that comes up too often.
